channel.title: Summaries of the Best Books on 'Psychology' on Shortened Books
channel.description: Recent content in Summaries of the Best Books on 'Psychology' on Shortened Books

item.title: The Narcissist in Your Life Summary of Key Ideas and Review - Julie Hall
item.description: “The Narcissist in Your Life: Recognizing the Patterns and Learning to Break Free” by Julie Hall is a comprehensive guide that delves into the complex dynamics of dealing with narcissistic individuals.

item.title: The Covert Passive-Aggressive Narcissist Summary of Key Ideas and Review - Debbie Mirza
item.description: “The Covert Passive-Aggressive Narcissist: Recognizing the Traits and Finding Healing After Hidden Emotional and Psychological Abuse” is a comprehensive guide written by Debbie Mirza.

item.title: How To Kill A Narcissist Summary of Key Ideas and Review - JH Simon
item.description: “How To Kill A Narcissist: Debunking The Myth Of Narcissism And Recovering From Narcissistic Abuse” by JH Simon is a compelling and insightful guide that delves deep into the world of narcissism and its pervasive effects on individuals.

item.title: Disarming the Narcissist Summary of Key Ideas and Review - Wendy Behary
item.description: “Disarming the Narcissist: Surviving and Thriving with the Self-Absorbed,” written by Wendy T.

item.title: Unmasking Narcissism Summary of Key Ideas and Review - Mark Ettensohn
item.description: “Unmasking Narcissism: A Guide to Understanding the Narcissist in Your Life” by Mark Ettensohn is a comprehensive exploration of narcissism and its impact on relationships.

item.title: The New Science of Narcissism Summary of Key Ideas and Review - Keith Campbell
item.description: “The New Science of Narcissism: Understanding One of the Greatest Psychological Challenges of Our Timeâ€”and What You Can Do About It” is a thought-provoking book that delves into the complex world of narcissism.

item.title: The Narcissism Epidemic Summary of Key Ideas and Review - Jean Twenge
item.description: “The Narcissism Epidemic: Living in the Age of Entitlement” by Jean Twenge and Keith Campbell is a comprehensive exploration into the rising tide of narcissism in contemporary society.

item.title: Advice Not Given Summary of Key Ideas and Review - Mark Epstein
item.description: “Advice Not Given: A Guide to Getting Over Yourself” by Mark Epstein is an exploration of the intersection between Eastern philosophy, psychology, and personal growth.

item.title: 8 Secrets to Powerful Manifesting Summary of Key Ideas and Review - Mandy Morris
item.description: “8 Secrets to Powerful Manifesting” by Mandy Morris is an enlightening and empowering self-help book that delves into the art of manifestation and how to create the life you desire.
